initiatives.name: Client Growth
initiatives.primaryFailureMechanism: Vendor relationship breakdown and technical debt accumulation
initiatives.requiredDecisionThisWeek: Terminate vendor contract and redirect $4M to core platform
verdictRationale: Budget overrun of 40% exceeds recovery threshold with vendor relationship permanently damaged
Timeline slippage of 45 days pushes beyond 30-day irreversibility window for digital transformation
Quality degradation to CRITICAL level means technical debt cannot be resolved within strategic timeframe

decisionThisWeek.title: Re-scope vendor contract and redirect $8M to alternative platform
decisionThisWeek.consequence: Delay beyond Friday will result in permanent $3M monthly vendor bleed and complete platform failure

irreversibility.consequence: Platform becomes permanently unrecoverable, requiring complete restart at $25M+ cost

initiatives.name: Enterprise Advice Center (EAC)
initiatives.primaryFailureMechanism: Integration failures and user adoption resistance
verdictRationale: Customer retention deterioration of 18% exceeds acceptable intervention threshold
Integration failures creating technical debt that will compound beyond 30-day window
Leadership capacity insufficient to resolve adoption resistance within recovery timeframe

decisionThisWeek.title: Replace VP Customer Success and redirect $3M to customer experience overhaul
decisionThisWeek.consequence: Delay will result in permanent 23% customer retention loss and $12M annual revenue impact

irreversibility.consequence: Customer trust erosion becomes permanent, requiring complete brand repositioning at $18M+ cost

initiatives.name: Wholesale Credit Underwriting
initiatives.primaryFailureMechanism: Data quality issues and delayed implementation
initiatives.requiredDecisionThisWeek: Increase investment by $2M or accept 6-month delay
verdictRationale: Data quality degradation threatens compliance reporting requirements within 35-day window
Budget variance of 31% exceeds threshold for continued investment without intervention
Timeline slippage of 18 days combined with technical complexity requires immediate escalation

decisionThisWeek.title: Increase budget by $2M and replace data engineering lead
decisionThisWeek.consequence: Delay will result in regulatory non-compliance and $8M in fines plus remediation costs

irreversibility.consequence: Data foundation becomes inadequate for strategic analytics, requiring complete rebuild at $12M+ cost

initiatives.name: Fraud
initiatives.requiredDecisionThisWeek: Reduce scope or delay other initiatives
verdictRationale: Scope creep of 26% threatens API modernization dependency and platform reliability
Timeline slippage of 12 days within 42-day irreversibility window requires immediate action
Resource competition with customer experience platform creates delivery risk

decisionThisWeek.title: Reduce scope by 30% and delay non-critical features by 6 months
decisionThisWeek.consequence: Delay will force cancellation and $4.2M write-off plus platform discontinuity costs

irreversibility.consequence: Mobile platform becomes obsolete relative to market standards, requiring complete replacement at $8M+ cost

initiatives.name: Wealth Management Advisor (WM Advisor)
verdictRationale: On track with 5% budget variance within acceptable tolerance

decisionThisWeek.title: Continue as planned with standard monitoring

irreversibility.consequence: Minor delays would require only incremental investment to recover

decisions.title: Re-scope Digital Transformation Platform
decisions.delayCostNarrative: Delaying re-scoping will consume $2M weekly in failing vendor costs and prevent rescue of dependent initiatives
decisions.ifRejectedConsequence: Continued $2M weekly bleed will exhaust contingency budget within 4 weeks.

decisions.title: Redirect Customer Experience Resources
decisions.delayCostNarrative: Continued resource drain will force mobile app cancellation and damage customer retention by 23%
decisions.ifRejectedConsequence: Customer trust erosion becomes permanent, eliminating recovery options within 22-day window.

decisions.title: Increase Data Analytics Investment or Accept Delay
decisions.delayCostNarrative: Accepting delay will push compliance reporting deadlines by 4 months and increase regulatory risk
decisions.ifRejectedConsequence: Investment increase may delay other initiatives but preserves 35-day recovery window.

decisions.title: Reduce Mobile App Scope or Accept Delays
decisions.delayCostNarrative: Scope expansion will delay API modernization by 8 weeks and reduce platform reliability by 30%
decisions.ifRejectedConsequence: Continued scope creep will eliminate recovery options within 42-day irreversibility window.

decisions.title: Prioritize ERP Integration Over Legacy Systems
decisions.delayCostNarrative: Delaying ERP priority will extend supply chain failures by 12 weeks and increase operational costs by $1.8M monthly
decisions.ifRejectedConsequence: ERP integration becomes permanently blocked, requiring emergency vendor contracts at 3x cost.
